description.value:
Special: Balanced, Felling (4)

Note: Weapon: Staff. Daemon WP 80 (Greater Daemon of Tzeentch), Bind Str 4. Att.: Accursed, Howling, Living Magic, Sorcerous Force Two-Handed, Acts as Psy Focus, Requires Mark of Tzeentch to wield. Gain Fear(+1) on turn where attacked, Gain 2xDaemon's WP Bonus to Focus Power Tests, On dealing damage can make Opposed WP Test vs Target using Daemon's Willpower, each DoS deals 1d10 E Damage.
